name: Grassland (Chicxulub)
description:
An afternoon daydream

Click to wander around. When you're tired, have a seat and read a book.

Every time you sit down to read, a children's book will be selected for you from the Project Gutenberg library.

A small interactive scene by chicxulub

Sound recordings by Liancu, Ohrwurm, JanKoehl, superex1110, sidequesting, NachtmahrTV, brunobegot, THE_bizniss, Percy Duke, klankbeeld, dersuperanton
